gameobjects.items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobjects.items.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Treasure

    public abstract class Item
extends Object
    Items can provide different types of bonuses. Their effects are checked before actions.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomItem

        public static Item getRandomItem(Random rand)
        Get a random item from the available items. The item cannot return true with winsGame().
        Parameters:
        rand - The random used for randomisation.
        Returns:
        The random item.

      • onAttack

        public int onAttack(int amount)
        If the item changes attack strength, it is modified by this method
        Parameters:
        amount - Original attack strengh.
        Returns:

      • onDamageReceived

        public int onDamageReceived(int amount)
        If the item changes the amount of damage received, it is modified by this method
        Parameters:
        amount - Original damage.
        Returns:
        Modified damage.

      • winsGame

        public boolean winsGame()
        Check if this item wins the game.
        Returns:
        Does this item win the game.

      • onHeal

        public int onHeal(int amount)
        If the item modifies the amount of health the owner receives on heal, it is modified by this method.
        Parameters:
        amount - The original health to be gained.
        Returns:
        The modified health to be gained.
